about.title: About Pavones Boxing Club
about.description: Pavones Boxing Club was created in 2024 to improve access to fitness training, classes and activities including boxing, muay thai, kickboxing, weight training, cardio, core, flexibility and much more. In addition, the club trainers and coaches offer private training sessions personalized to your needs. Pavones Boxing Club is located in Playa Pavones, Costa Rica. Nestled in the breathtaking jungles and beaches of the southern Pacific zone of Costa Rica, it's no wonder that people travel from all over the world to surf in Pavones and train at Pavones Boxing Club.

gymTajalin.description: Located in Pavones, Costa Rica, Gym Tajalin is fully equipped to cover all your training needs, offering free weights, cable machines, boxing bags, and much more. Drop-in passes and monthly memberships are available.

location.title: About Pavones
location.description: Tucked into the southern Pacific coast of Costa Rica, Pavones is a hidden gem far from the tourist crowds. Known among surfers for its legendary left-hand point break, the village sits where the jungle meets the ocean. It's raw, beautiful, and the perfect backdrop for a month of training and adventure.

coach.title: Your Coach
coach.name: Pierre
coach.description: Pierre is the founder and head coach of Pavones Boxing Club — the original boxing and muay thai gym in Pavones. With years of experience training fighters and beginners alike, Pierre brings professional-level coaching to a world-class setting.

level.question: Do I need experience in muay thai or surfing?
level.answer: Not at all. The camp is designed for all levels — from complete beginners to experienced practitioners. Our coaches will tailor training to your ability.

bring.question: What should I bring?
bring.answer: Bring your personal gear (clothes, sunscreen, etc.), training equipment, and surf board if you have your own. We can help arrange surf board rentals if needed.

lodging.question: What is the lodging like?
lodging.answer: We provide different accommodation options based on the experience you are looking for. We promise close and easy access to the gym, surf, and jungle in Pavones. More details on specific lodging options shared after you contact us with interest.

travel.question: How do I get to Pavones?
travel.answer: Fly into San José (SJO). From there, take a quick 45-minute flight into Golfito or make the 6-hour scenic drive to Pavones on the southern Pacific coast.

dates.question: When exactly is the camp?
dates.answer: The camp is planned for 2027. The exact month is still being finalized. Register your interest and we'll notify you as soon as dates are confirmed.
